command.program:
check_samplesheet.py \
        samplesheet_test.csv \
        samplesheet.valid.csv

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_CHIPSEQ:CHIPSEQ:INPUT_CHECK:SAMPLESHEET_CHECK":
        python: $(python --version | sed 's/Python //g')
    END_VERSIONS

samtools faidx genome.fa
    cut -f 1,2 genome.fa.fai > genome.fa.sizes

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_CHIPSEQ:CHIPSEQ:PREPARE_GENOME:CUSTOM_GETCHROMSIZES":
        custom: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

mkdir bwa
    bwa \
        index \
         \
        -p bwa/genome \
        genome.fa

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_CHIPSEQ:CHIPSEQ:PREPARE_GENOME:BWA_INDEX":
        bwa: $(echo $(bwa 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Version: //; s/Contact:.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

unique-kmers.py \
        -k 50 \
        -R report.txt \
         \
        genome.fa

    grep ^number report.txt | sed 's/^.*:.[[:blank:]]//g' > kmers.txt

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_CHIPSEQ:CHIPSEQ:KHMER_UNIQUEKMERS":
        khmer: $( unique-kmers.py --version 2>&1 | grep ^khmer | sed 's/^khmer //;s/ .*$//' )
    END_VERSIONS

gtf2bed \
        genes.gtf \
        > genes.bed

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_CHIPSEQ:CHIPSEQ:PREPARE_GENOME:GTF2BED":
        perl: $(echo $(perl --version 2>&1) | sed 's/.*v\(.*\)) built.*/\1/')
    END_VERSIONS

awk '{print $1, '0' , $2}' OFS='	' genome.fa.sizes > genome.include_regions.bed

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_CHIPSEQ:CHIPSEQ:PREPARE_GENOME:GENOME_BLACKLIST_REGIONS":
            bedtools: $(bedtools --version | sed -e "s/bedtools v//g")
        END_VERSIONS

[ ! -f  SPT5_INPUT_REP1_T1_1.fastq.gz ] && ln -s SRR5204809_Spt5-ChIP_Input1_SacCer_ChIP-Seq_ss100k_R1.fastq.gz SPT5_INPUT_REP1_T1_1.fastq.gz
        [ ! -f  SPT5_INPUT_REP1_T1_2.fastq.gz ] && ln -s SRR5204809_Spt5-ChIP_Input1_SacCer_ChIP-Seq_ss100k_R2.fastq.gz SPT5_INPUT_REP1_T1_2.fastq.gz
